title: Balanced generation of holes and superoxide radicals on Bi25CoO40 sillenite photocatalysts for rapidly synergetic degradation of quinolone antibiotics
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00177J, Paper
Hao Sun, Chen Wang, Yunhang Shao, Yaning Zhang, Chaofeng Chen, Hongyan Liu, Shuai Dou, Jing Xu, Ying Zhang, Yang Lou, Hui Wang, Yongfa Zhu, Chengsi Pan
Herein, Bi25CoO40 sillenite nanosheets with a thickness of approximately 1.4 nm were successfully prepared. These nanosheets exhibit broad solar spectrum absorption beyond 900 nm and excellent photodegradation activity of ciprofloxacin....
